keywords: Oceans > Ocean Temperature > Water Temperature, Oceans > Salinity/Density > Conductivity, Oceans > Salinity/Density > Ocean Salinity > Practical Salinity
TEMP_comment: Ship CTD temperature used to correct mooring SBE sensors
PSAL_comment: Salinity compared with corrected ship CTD salinity at 2/2/3/3/3 different times. Ship CTD salinity corrected by comparing with bottle salinity from the deepest depth. Salinity correction is linear. Salinity corrected by -0.00219 / +0.0124 / +0.01238 / +0.0381 / +0.0157 to all data at that depth.
PRES_comment: Pressure at 800 and 1200 m estimated by adding the distance to the SBE sensor above.

keywords: Oceans > Ocean Chemistry > Carbon Dioxide > Carbon Dioxide Partial Pressure
PCOW_comment: Validated by comparison with calculated pCO2 from discrete DIC and TA samples.
